summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Battleship game. Backend APIs (14/14 tests passed) and frontend user flows working correctly. Admin functionality, user management, game creation, ship placement, and multiplayer lobby all functional.

design_issues.issue: Ship placement is click-based rather than drag-and-drop as specified in requirements
Console warnings about missing Dialog descriptions for accessibility

passed_tests: Admin user creation with username, password, and avatar selection
Admin view all users and games functionality
User game creation with ship placement validation
Ship placement validation (3 ships: sizes 4,3,2, no overlaps, within bounds)
User view available games in lobby
Real-time game state updates via polling (3 second intervals)
Responsive UI with proper player information display
Navigation between login, lobby, and game pages

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (core flows working, minor UI improvements needed)
